text: [Music]
I was less than 0.2 miles away from the
finish line where the explosions went
off like it's the first time the first
one went off I thought it was a big
celebratory thing and I just kept going
and then the second one went off night
we saw debris fly in the air just took
off and ran with the complete opposite
direction you felt the blast oh yeah and
did you see any other aftermath no well
I could see down the street but I didn't
want to walk down there but I could see
ambulances fire trucks all sorts of
people running could you tell where they
were coming from what kind of explosions
if it sound like did you feel it I could
feel it there were two of my left was
one like I said and then the second one
was right next to him the same side of
the street it was a plume I could feel
it as I was running it sounded like a
large cannon overall behind us was just
a background
